thread.title: Mystery death of British millionaire 'killed by Black Widow' deepens as it emerges body had ORGANS missing
thread.title_full: Mystery death of British millionaire 'killed by Black Widow' deepens as it emerges body had ORGANS missing

author: Alan Selby
title: Mystery death of British millionaire 'killed by Black Widow' deepens as it emerges body had ORGANS missing
text:
News Mystery death of British millionaire 'killed by Black Widow' deepens as it emerges body had ORGANS missing Barry Pring, 47, is believed to have complained about a burning sensation while eating his final meal just hours before he was mown down and killed Share Barry Pring met Anna Ziuzina online in 2006 and married a year later in 2007 (Photo: SWNS.com) Share Get politics   
The body of a British millionaire allegedly killed in a plot involving his Ukrainian internet bride was returned to the UK with organs missing, it was revealed last night. 
Barry Pring was mown down in the eastern European country by a car at 80mph in 2008. 
An inquest last week ruled Devon-born Barry, 47, was unlawfully killed – and heard claims his wife Ganna Ziuzina, 38, was behind it. 
It has now emerged that Mr Pring's body was returned to the UK without his kidneys or liver, according to The Sun. 
His body has also been embalmed, meaning his blood could not be tested. 
Mr Pring is believed to have complained about a burning sensation while eating his final meal, just hours before he was mown down. 
This had led to speculation that the British businessman may have been poisoned, the newspaper reported. Read More Daughter's fury after carer left 73-year-old grandad to die alone in his home from heart condition Anna is now shacking up with new lover in Marbella villa 
Barry’s brother Shaughan, 54, has vowed to continue a nine-year battle for justice which has already cost the family £200,000. 
He hit out after it emerged that Ziuzina is living “like the Queen of Sheba”. 
The former lapdancer, dubbed the Black Widow, is shacked up in a £700,000 Spanish villa with a new lover. 
Shaughan told the Sunday Mirror: “She’s living like the Queen of Sheba. The Ukrainian police have done nothing – they’re not going to do anything now, especially with the corruption we’re facing from some of them out there.” 
Spelling out his determination to get to the bottom of what happened, he added: “I don’t think she realised the quiet brother down in Devon, the country bumpkin married for 30-odd years, would take this on like we did. She totally underestimated us.” 
The inquest in Exeter ruled millionaire Barry was “tricked” into standing in the road just moments before the car – with no lights on and stolen number plates – smashed into him. 
The inquest heard claims that Ziuzina left him standing there after going back to a restaurant to retrieve a dropped glove. 
Peter Clifford, best man at the couple’s Kiev wedding, told the inquest: “There is no reasonable doubt in my mind that Barry was murdered, nor is there any reasonable doubt in my mind Ganna Ziuzina either arranged for, or was complicit in, his murder.” Barry's brother Shaughan Pring is determined to get to the bottom of what happened (Photo: PA) 
And Barry’s mum Irene said: “We are sure Ganna had some involvement in Barry’s death in order to inherit money or property.” 
Ziuzina was granted legal aid to fight for assets from Barry’s estate. She is now in Marbella with British property and fashion mogul Ivan Lister, 48, and their daughter, three. 
Barry met Ziuzina online in 2006. They wed in January 2007 and she was pictured lazing by a pool at his parents’ home later that year. 
Barry was killed outside Kiev shortly after his first wedding anniversary. 
Ahead of the inquest, Devon and Cornwall Police said Ziuzina was “probably” in Spain. The media traced her on Friday. Read More In my darkest days I wanted to kill myself but now I'm baring all as I'm so proud of my body says Vicky Balch Anna Ziuzina lazing by a pool at Barry's parents' home 
Hitting out at Kiev police, Shaughan said: “The Ukrainian police is doing sweet f*** all. Certain members are corrupt. Certain members are totally incompetent. It’s only because we pursued it that they reluctantly started to do something.” 
He also accused the Foreign Office of dragging its heels – though former Prime Minister David Cameron did write to Ukrainian authorities in 2013. 
Shaughan called on current PM Theresa May to pile further pressure on Kiev. He said: “The British Government need to demand that our police take the case over.” 
A spokesman for the Foreign Office said: “We have provided support and advice since 2008. Our sympathies remain with the family at this difficult time.” Anna Ziuzina is believed to romantically involved with British property and fashion mogul Ivan Lister (Photo: Rob Todd/Daily Mail/SOLO Syndication) 
Ziuzina has previously said she gave three statements to police in Ukraine and did not “believe I can add anything further”. 
But Shaughan said the family would only be happy when Barry’s killer was jailed. 
He added: “That’s the only time we’ll get closure.” Like us on Facebook
